post.summary: Creates a home case.

incident.description: I have an issue with the lock, can't open my door.

schema.description: All information usefull to create a home case.

occurred_at.description: Date-time at which the incident occurred.

country.description:
Country.
ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

additional_information.description: Additional information about the location.

description.example: I have an issue with the lock, can't open my door.

policy_number.description: The policy number or subscription number.

policy_holder.description: Information related to the holder of the policy.

first_name.description: First name of the policy holder.

last_name.description: Last name of the policy holder.

address_postal_code.description: Address postal code of the policy holder.

contact.description: Information related to the contact for the case.

preferred_language.description:
Language in which the contact wish to be contacted.
List of ISO 639-1 codes.

international_prefix.description: Prefix of the phone number.

number.description: Phone number of the beneficiary (any).

appointment_proposals.description:
List of appointments proposed by the contact.
N.B. If no values are defined, the appointment is considered to be as soon as possible.

start_at.description:
Starting datetime of the proposed appointment.
UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

end_at.description:
Ending datetime of the proposed appointment.
UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

preferred_order.description:
The contact preferred appointment order.
Lower number, higher preference.

N.B. Can be filled with the call identifier when the case is created via a voicebot.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA.

- test --> UAT / User Acceptance Environment.

schema.description: All information usefull to create a motor case.

registration_number.description: Registration number of the damaged vehicle.

vehicle_type.description:
Type of the vehicle.
The values are :
- 3RD_WHEELER: Third wheeler,
- AGRICULTURAL_TRUCK: Agricultural truck
- BIKE: Bike
- BUS_COACHES: Bus coaches, autocar
- CAR: Car
- MOBILE_HOME_CAMPING_CAR: Mobile home, camper van
- MOTORCYCLE: Motorcycle
- MINI_CAR: Mini car, mini bus
- TRAILER: Trailer
- TRUCK: Truck
- VAN: Van

second_registration_number.description:
Registration number of the attached vehicle.

Can be truck registration number in case the damaged vehicle is a trailer, or the trailer registration number if the damage vehicle is a truck.

Mandatory when _vehicle_type_ is equal to _TRAILER_.

unit.description:
Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case insensitive.

Available values:

- \[IN_BR]: Inches;
- M: Meter.

Unit of the measure code.
The possible values are :
| Unit of measure | Description
| --------------- | -----------
| CM3             | Cubic centimeter
| M3              | Cubic meter
unit.format: Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

gross_weight.description: Maximum loaded weight of the vehicle, as determined by the manufacturer.

unit.format: Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case insensitive.

number_of_axles.description: Total number of axles of the vehicle.

gearbox_type.description:
The gear box of the vehicle
The possible values are:
- AUTO: Automatic gearbox
- MANUAL: Manual gearbox
- SEMI_AUTO: Semi automatic gearbox
- SPEED_VARIATOR: Speed variator
- UNKNOWN: Unkown

fuel_type.description:
The fuel type of the vehicle.
The possible values are:
- ALCOHOL_ETHANOL: Alcohol ethanol
- BIO_DIESEL: Biologic Diesel
- DIESEL: Diesel
- ELECTRIC: Electricity
- ELECTRIC_DIESEL: Electricity and diesel hybrid
- ELECTRIC_GASOLINE: Electricity and gasoline hybrid
- GASOLINE: Gasoline
- HYDROGEN: Hydrogen
- LIQUID_PETROL_GAS: Liquid Petrol Gas hybrid
- NATURAL_GAS: Natural gas hybrid
- UNKNOWN: Unknown

is_four_wheel_drive.description: Indicates if the vehicle is a 4x4.

has_a_trailer_attached.description: Indicates if the vehicle has a trailer attached.

is_loaded.description: Indicates if the vehicle is loaded.

intervention_type.description:
Type of intervention required:
- TOW_OR_REPAIR: The vehicle needs a towing or can be repaired on spot.
- STOP_AND_GO: The vehicles is redirected to a garage.

policy_number.description: The policy number or subscription number.

initial_situation_assessment.description: Assessment of the situation right after the customer accident.

is_vehicle_in_mud_or_a_ditch.description: Indicates if the vehicle is in the mud or in a ditch.

has_no_longer_wheels.description: Indicates if the vehicle has no longer wheels.

is_wheels_blocked_or_missing.description: Indicates that some wheels are blocked or missing.

is_police_called.description: Indicates if the police is called and are on their way or already on site

is_thirdparty_involved.description: Indicates if there is a third-party involved

is_anyone_injured.description: Indicates if there is anyone injured.

vehicle_damage.description:
Indicates what part of the vehicle is damaged.
The possible values are:
- CHASSIS: use it to indicate that the chassis is damaged
- WINDSHIELD: use it indicate that the windshield is damaged
- NO_DAMAGE: use it to indicate that no damage is found on the vehicle

position.description:
Position of the damaged tyre on the truck or the trailer.
The list of values to use is:
- 1:  Tractor - Front axle - right 1
- 2:  Tractor - Front axle - right 2
- 3:  Tractor - Rear axle - right outer 1
- 4:  Tractor - Rear axle - right inner 1
- 5:  Tractor - Rear axle - right outer 2
- 6:  Tractor - Rear axle - right inner 2
- 7:  Trailer - Front axle - right outer 1
- 8:  Trailer - Front axle - right inner 1
- 9:  Trailer - Front axle - right outer 2
- 10: Trailer - Front axle - right inner 2
- 11: Trailer - Rear axle - right outer 1
- 12: Trailer - Rear axle - right inner 1
- 13: Trailer - Rear axle - right outer 2
- 14: Trailer - Rear axle - right inner 2
- 15: Trailer - Rear axle - right outer 3
- 16: Trailer - Rear axle - right inner 3
- 17: Tractor - Front axle - left 1
- 18: Tractor - Front axle - left 2
- 19: Tractor - Rear axle - left inner 1
- 20: Tractor - Rear axle - left outer 1
- 21: Tractor - Rear axle - left inner 2
- 22: Tractor - Rear axle - left outer 2
- 23: Trailer - Front axle - left inner 1
- 24: Trailer - Front axle - left outer 1
- 25: Trailer - Front axle - left inner 2
- 26: Trailer - Front axle - left outer 2
- 27: Trailer - Rear axle - left inner 1
- 28: Trailer - Rear axle - left outer 1
- 29: Trailer - Rear axle - left inner 2
- 30: Trailer - Rear axle - left outer 2
- 31: Trailer - Rear axle - left inner 3
- 32: Trailer - Rear axle - left outer 3

is_tyre_repairable.description: Indicate if the tyre is repairable.

is_a_new_rim_required.description: Indicate if a new rim is required.

is_a_spare_tyre_available.description: Indicate if there a spare tyre on spot.

current_location.description: Current vehicle location when the incident happened.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

place_type.description: Place type where the vehicle is parked.

has_a_height_restriction.description: Indicates if there is a height restriction on vehicle location.

additional_information.description: Additional information about vehicle location.

international_prefix.description: Prefix of the phone number.

number.description: Phone number of the contact (any).

is_policy_holder.description: Indicates if the customer is a policy holder.

is_on_site.description: Indicates if the customer is on site.

international_prefix.description: Prefix of the phone number.

number.description: Phone number of the contact (any).

address_postal_code.description: Address postal code of the policy holder.

is_scheduled.description: Indicates if an appointment is scheduled.

scheduled_at.description: Date and time of appointment if it's scheduled - UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

created_at.description:
Creation datetime of the case.
UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

service_code.description:
The code of the service.
The possible value are :
- TOWING: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place
- REPAIR_ON_SPOT: Repair the vehicle directly on the location of the incident
- LIFTING_CRANE: Lift the vehicle
- DELIVERY: Deliver the vehicle (repaired, replacement or hired) to the customer location
- STORAGE: Put the vehicle in a secure location
- REPATRIATION: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place, but on very long distance

202.description: Case created and has been accepted for processing, but the processing has not been totally completed.

created_at.description:
Creation datetime of the case.
UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

service_code.description:
The code of the service.
The possible value are :
- TOWING: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place
- REPAIR_ON_SPOT: Repair the vehicle directly on the location of the incident
- LIFTING_CRANE: Lift the vehicle
- DELIVERY: Deliver the vehicle (repaired, replacement or hired) to the customer location
- STORAGE: Put the vehicle in a secure location
- REPATRIATION: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place, but on very long distance

parameters.description: Unique case identifier.

parameters.name: x-tenant-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA.

service_code.description:
The code of the service.
The possible value are:
- EXPERT: Expert to confirm initial incident diagnosis and overall situation

created_at.description:
Creation datetime of the service.

UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

allOf.description:
Code of the status, it can be:
- COMPLETED: The service is completed.
- CREATED: The service is created.
- ONGOING: The service is ongoing.

is_scheduled_service.description: Indicates that the service provided has been scheduled for a particular time, given a request from the client or the garage availability.

appointment_period.description:
The period during which the expert will perform the assessment.

N.B. This property is required when `is_scheduled_service` is equal to `true`.

from.description:
Date and time of the beginning of the period.
UTC datetime RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

to.description:
Date and time of the end of the period.
UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

service_code.description:
The code of the service.

The possible value are:

- ACCOMMODATION: Provide the customer with accommodation for nights

- DELIVERY: Deliver the vehicle (repaired, replacement or hired) to the customer location

- LIFTING_CRANE: Lift the vehicle

- RENTAL: Provide the customer(s) with one or several replacement vehicle(s)

- REPAIR_ON_SPOT: Repair the vehicle directly on the location of the incident

- TAXI: Provide the customer(s) one or several taxi(s) for a given trip

- TRAVEL_TICKET_BOAT: Book boat ticket(s) for the customer

- TRAVEL_TICKET_PLANE: Book plane ticket(s) for the customer

- TRAVEL_TICKET_TRAIN: Book train ticket(s) for the customer

created_at.description:
Creation datetime of the service.

UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

allOf.description:
Code of the status, it can be:
- COMPLETED: The service is completed.
- CREATED: The service is created.
- ONGOING: The service is ongoing.

oneOf.description: Information related to the different kind of towing.

service_code.description:
The code of the service.
The possible value are:
- REPATRIATION: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place, but on very long distance
- STORAGE: Put the vehicle in a secure location
- TOWING: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place

created_at.description:
Creation datetime of the service.

allOf.description:

- COMPLETED: The service is completed.
- CREATED: The service is created.
- ONGOING: The service is ongoing.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

post.summary: Creates a service.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Unique case identifier.

parameters.name: x-tenant-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA.

service_code.description:
Type of the requested service, it can be:
- RENTAL: Provide the customer(s) with one or several replacement vehicle(s)
- TAXI: Provide the customer(s) one or several taxi(s) for a given trip.

questions_and_answers.description: Information related to the question and answers provided by the reporter.

priority.description:
The priority of the question, the lower the higher.
N.B. 0 means that the question has no priority.

enumeration_answers.description:
List of the answers.
Required when `question_type` is equal to `ENUM`.

answer_text.description: The text of the answer to be displayed to the user.

answered_text.description:
Text of the answer.
Required when `question_type` is equal to `STRING` or `LOCATION`.

answered_amount.description:
Answered monitary amount.
Required when `question_type` is equal to `MONETARY_AMOUNT`.

currency.description:
Currency of the amount.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

answered_distance.description:
Answered distance.
Required when `question_type` is equal to `DISTANCE`.

answered_boolean.description:
Answered boolean.
Required when `question_type` is equal to `BOOLEAN`.

answered_weight.description:
Answered weight.
Required when `question_type` is equal to `WEIGHT`.

unit.format: Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case insensitive.

answered_number.description:
Answered number.
Required when `question_type` is equal to `NUMBER`.

answered_date.description:
Answered date.
ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).
Required when `question_type` is equal to `DATE`.

answered_date_time.description:
Answered date-time.
UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).
Required when `question_type` is equal to `DATE_TIME`.

destination.description: Destination where the customer should arrived.

parameters.name: claim_id
parameters.description: Claim identifier.

type.description:
Type of the involved contact it can be:
- COMPANY: Legal person that can be a private or public organization.
- INDIVIDUAL: Natural person that is a human being.

person.description:
Information related to the person's identity.
N.B. Required when `type` is equal to `INDIVIDUAL`.

identity.description: Information related to the person's identity.

items.description: Nationality, ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

preferred_language.description:
Language in which the natural person wished to be contacted.
List of ISO 639-1 codes.

registrations.description: List of registration of the natural person.

expiring_date.description:
Date at which the registration will or has expired.
ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

issue_date.description:
Date at which the registration was issued.
ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

issued_country.description:
Country that issued the registration.
ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

preferred_communication_channel.description: Communication channel on which the person preferred to be contacted.

phone.description:
Phone on which the person can be contacted.
Required if `preferred_communication_channel` is equal to `PHONE`.

international_prefix.description: Prefix to be added to be called from abroad.

number.description: Phone number. Can be local or international.

email.description:
Email on which the person can be contacted.
Required if `preferred_communication_channel` is equal to `EMAIL`.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

bank_account.description: Bank account of the natural person.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

holder_name.description: Name of the account holder as registered on the bank account.

preferred_transfer_type.description:
Preferred transfer type for this bank account:
| Type      | Label                                                                              | Additional Required fields |
|-----------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------|
| ABA_RTN   | American Bankers Association - Routing Transit Number                              | routing_number             |
| BSB       | Bank State Branch                                                                  | routing_number             |
| CLABE     | Clave Bancaria Estandarizada                                                       | bank_identification_number |
| IBAN      | Internation Bank Account Number                                                    | bank_identification_number |
| IFSC      | Indian Financial System Code                                                       | bank_identification_number |
| NSC       | National Sort Code                                                                 | routing_number             |
| SWIFT_BIC | Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication - Bank Identifier Code | bank_identification_number |

currency.description:
Currency of the bank account.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

routing_number.description:
Routing code, sort code of the bank account. Typically used for national transfer and it must be used for:
- _ABA_RTN_ and must follow the format defined [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABA_routing_transit_number).
- _BSB_ and must follow the format defined [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bank_state_branch).
- _NSC_ and must follow the format defined [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sort_code).

bank_identification_number.description:
The bank identification number. Required when _preferred_transfer_type_ is equal to:
- _CLABE_, _IBAN_, _SWIFT_BIC_ and must follow the format defined [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_9362).
- _IFSC_ and must follow the format defined [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indian_Financial_System_Code).

company.description:
Information related to the company's identity.
N.B. Required when `type` is equal to `COMPANY`.

N.B. Required when `type` is equal to `INDIVIDUAL`.

identity.description: Information related to the person's identity.

items.description: Nationality, ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

preferred_language.description:
Language in which the natural person wished to be contacted.
List of ISO 639-1 codes.

registrations.description: List of registration of the natural person.

expiring_date.description:
Date at which the registration will or has expired.
ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

issue_date.description:
Date at which the registration was issued.
ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

issued_country.description:
Country that issued the registration.
ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

preferred_communication_channel.description: Communication channel on which the person preferred to be contacted.

phone.description:
Phone on which the person can be contacted.
Required if `preferred_communication_channel` is equal to `PHONE`.

international_prefix.description: Prefix to be added to be called from abroad.

number.description: Phone number. Can be local or international.

email.description:
Email on which the person can be contacted.
Required if `preferred_communication_channel` is equal to `EMAIL`.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

bank_account.description: Bank account of the natural person.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

holder_name.description: Name of the account holder as registered on the bank account.

preferred_transfer_type.description:
Preferred transfer type for this bank account:
| Type      | Label                                                                              | Additional Required fields |
|-----------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------|
| ABA_RTN   | American Bankers Association - Routing Transit Number                              | routing_number             |
| BSB       | Bank State Branch                                                                  | routing_number             |
| CLABE     | Clave Bancaria Estandarizada                                                       | bank_identification_number |
| IBAN      | Internation Bank Account Number                                                    | bank_identification_number |
| IFSC      | Indian Financial System Code                                                       | bank_identification_number |
| NSC       | National Sort Code                                                                 | routing_number             |
| SWIFT_BIC | Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication - Bank Identifier Code | bank_identification_number |

currency.description:
Currency of the bank account.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

routing_number.description:
Routing code, sort code of the bank account. Typically used for national transfer and it must be used for:
- _ABA_RTN_ and must follow the format defined [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABA_routing_transit_number).
- _BSB_ and must follow the format defined [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bank_state_branch).
- _NSC_ and must follow the format defined [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sort_code).

bank_identification_number.description:
The bank identification number. Required when _preferred_transfer_type_ is equal to:
- _CLABE_, _IBAN_, _SWIFT_BIC_ and must follow the format defined [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_9362).
- _IFSC_ and must follow the format defined [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indian_Financial_System_Code).

parameters.name: x-tenant-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA (example 42bbd332fa8f48e7bb382165f257a579).

parameters.name: partner_reference
parameters.description: Reference of the partner that have issued the policy with Axa (for example Michelin)

parameters.name: policy_number
parameters.description:
Policy number or subscription number registered in the contract between the partner and the customer.
Used for open fleets. No need to fulfill registration_number if used.

parameters.name: registration_number
parameters.description:
The registration number of the covered vehicle.
Used for closed fleets. No need to fulfill policy_number if used.

get.summary: Retrieve consumer electronic customer policy summaries.

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: Accepted language, IANA language codification. If language not managed, "en" will be used by default.

parameters.name: customer_email
parameters.description: The customer email.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: The device identifier.

parameters.name: holder_last_name
parameters.description: The policy holder last name.

parameters.name: holder_birthdate
parameters.description: The policy holder date of birth. Mandatory if policy holder last name provided - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: agent_scope
parameters.description: The scope selected by the agent when the police was created.

parameters.name: policy_number
parameters.description: Final policy number.

200.description: List of consumer electronics policy summaries.

policy_number.description: Final policy number (only exist if policy is not draft).

last_name.description: The last name of the policy holder.

first_name.description: The first name of the policy holder.

purchase_date.description: The date of the subscription (purchase) of the policy  - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

code.description: The code of the product catalog relied to the policy

contracting_actor_name.description: The legal entity relied to the customer.

401.description: Unauthorized (JWT not valid).

403.description: Forbidden (doesn't have the valid scope).

post.summary: Creates policy subscription.

external_policy_number.description: External policy identifier that can be provided by the partner.

subscription_country.description: Country where the customer subscribes the policy, ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

policy_start_date.description: The effective policy start date - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

quote_code.description: Quote code, partner can use a default value if provided by AXA or got it with quoting API.

point_of_sale.description: Point of sale of the policy.

external_sales_id.description: External identifier of the policy sale transaction.

agent_scope.description: The scope that agent has access.

currency.description: Currency, ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

price_after_discount_inc_tax.description: Price amount discounted including taxes, numeric with 2 decimals.

additional_information.description:
Additional information filled by the partner if needed
(example: ID card number, Serial number of the device...).

international_prefix.description: Prefix to be added to be called from abroad.

number.description: Phone number. Can be local or international.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

is_policy_beneficiary.description: Indicates if the policy holder is also a policy beneficiary.

beneficiaries.description: Beneficiaries list (other than the policy holder if he is also a beneficiary).

additional_information.description:
Additional information filled by the partner if needed
(example: ID card number, Serial number of the device...).

consents.description: List of consents displayed to the customer.

is_electronic_signature_preferred.description: True if the customer prefer to sign the policy electrically false if not.

imei_number.description: International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI) of the device.

coverage_period.description:
The coverage period - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).
The coverage start date is the date when it becomes possible for the customer to submit a claim.
The coverage end date is the date after which the coverage ends.

effective_period.description:
The effective period  - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

The end date indicates when the contract is ending. If the policy is cancelled, then the field is updated

post.summary: Cancel a policy according to its id.

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: Accepted language, IANA language codification. If language not managed, "en" will be used by default.

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: The policy identifier.

cancellation_date.description: Date when policy cancellation should be effective - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

cancellation_reason.description:
Reason for policy cancellation.

COOLING_OFF_PERIOD : Cancelled within product cooling off period as requested by the policy holder

PAYMENT_FAILURE : Cancelled in the event that payment has failed.

DISPUTED : Cancelled as a dispute has taken place with the policy holder and the insurer and it has been agreed to cancel the policy.

SPECIFIC_BENEFITS : Cancelled as the product benefits not meet the needs of the policy holder.

CHANGE_OF_PLAN : Cancelled in the case of a plan change requested by the customer with re-subscription.

DECLINED_ELECTRONIC_SIGNATURE: Cancelled when the customer has refused the electronic signature.

refund_amount.description: The refund amount for the policy.

currency.description:
Currency of the amount.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

coverage_end_date.description: End date of policy coverage - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

post.summary: Gets quotes for travel insurances.

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: Accepted language, IANA language codification. If language not managed, "en" will be used by default.

parameters.name: x-quote-mode
parameters.description: Quote mode, can be used to get a quote on draft or test mode.

parameters.name: x-tenant-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA (example 42bbd332fa8f48e7bb382165f257a579).

context.description:
Context of the request.
** Required if quote_code is null **

country.description: Customer country, ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

currency.description: Customer currency, ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

product_criteria.description:
Product criteria.
** Required if quote_code is null **

product_code.description: Product code, used if the quote request is for a specific product.

is_cheapest.description: Indicates if only the cheapest products hase to be provided.

travel.description:
Travel information.
** Required if quote_code is null **

cost.description: Total amount of the travel cost, numeric with 2 decimals.

destination_area.description: Global destination area. For example FRANCE, EUROPE, WORLDWIDE EXCLUDING USA & CANADA, WORLDWIDE INCLUDING USA & CANADA.

destination_country.description: Destination country, iso-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

origin_country.description: Origin country, ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

composition.description:
Composition of the travelers:
SINGLE = 1 Adult travelling without children (on their own)
COUPLE = 2 Adults travelling without children
FAMILY = 1 or N Adults travelling with N children and N infants
GROUP = N adults + N Children + N Seniors  +  N Infants where pricing is discounted by number of travellers

maximum_individual.description: The maximum score of the travelers medical screening.

total_party.description: The sum of all travellers medical screening.

has_card_affiliate_member.description:
- True if one of the travelers is a members of an association or cardholders of a particular card.
- False if none of the travelers is a member of an association or a cardholder.

has_complementary_insurance.description:
- True if one of the travelers has private medical insurance.
- False if none of the travelers has private medical insurance.

has_pre_existing_medical.description:
- True if one of the travelers has any medical conditions that could affect him whilst on a trip
- False if none of the travelers has any medical conditions that could affect him whilst on a trip.

start_date.description:
Start date of the travel or coverage (in case of multi-trip).
ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

end_date.description:
End date of the travel or coverage (in case of multi-trip).
ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

percentage.description: Commission value as percentage, numeric with 2 decimals.

amount.description:
Commission value as fixed amount
in the currency defined on the context, numeric with 2 decimals.

quote_code.description: Quote code.

addon_codes.description:
List of additional option codes that the customer can subscribe in addition to the product.
** Could be fulfilled only if quote_code is not null **

country.description: Customer country, ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

currency.description: Customer currency, ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

quote_expire_at.description:
Date and time of quotes expiration.
UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

quote_code.description: Quote code.

promo_code.description: Promotion code provided on the request, it is sent with the product/addon on which it has been applied.

post.summary: Allows the provider to refuse the mission order.

parameters.name: x-tenant-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA.

parameters.name: mission_order_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the mission order.

reason.description:
Reason of the refusal
The possible values are:
- CANT_ATTEMPT_WITHIN_SLA_TIME: Can't attempt with SLA time (Service Level Agreement)
- DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_EQUIPMENT: Provider does not have the right equipment
- DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_LICENCE: Provider does not have licence to perform this job
- DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_STAFF: Provider does not have right staff to perform the mission
- PROVIDER_NOT_AVAILABLE: Provider currently not available
- EQUIPMENT_NOT_AVAILABLE: Provider equipment currently not available
- LOCATION_OUT_OF_ZONE: Location out of zone
- OTHER: Any other reason. Use description to give the other reason

description.description: A description of the refusal is required when reason is equal to _OTHER_.

post.summary: Allows the provider to send a change request.

parameters.name: x-tenant-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA.

parameters.name: mission_id
parameters.description:
Identifier of the mission.
It is the same value than the identifier of the accepted mission order.

service.description: New service or equipment required to perform the mission.

service_code.description:
The code of the service.
The possible value are:
- CARPENTRY_ASSESS: Send a carpenter to evaluate the situation and produce a report giving additional information on the incident
- CARPENTRY_INSTALL: Send a carpenter to install a complete new item (I did not have the item before)
- CARPENTRY_MAINTENANCE: Send a carpenter to regular control (annual/periodic check)
- CARPENTRY_REPAIR: Send a carpenter to repair a broken item (this might include parts installation or replacement)
- CARPENTRY_REPLACE: Send a carpenter to replace a full / complete existing item with a new one
- CARPENTRY_TEMPORARY_SOLUTION: Send a carpenter to temporary fix - performed to reduce the level of urgency/severity of a specific incident
- ELECTRICS_ASSESS: Send an electrician to evaluate the situation and produce a report giving additional information on the incident
- ELECTRICS_INSTALL: Send an electrician to install a complete new item (I did not have the item before)
- ELECTRICS_MAINTENANCE: Send an electrician to regular control (annual/periodic check)
- ELECTRICS_REPAIR: Send an electrician to repair a broken item (this might include parts installation or replacement)
- ELECTRICS_REPLACE: Send an electrician to replace a full / complete existing item with a new one
- ELECTRICS_TEMPORARY_SOLUTION: Send an electrician to temporary fix - performed to reduce the level of urgency/severity of a specific incident
- EXTERNAL_DRAINAGE_ASSESS: Send a plumber to evaluate the situation and produce a report giving additional information on the incident on an external drainage situation
- EXTERNAL_DRAINAGE_INSTALL: Send a plumber to install a complete new item (I did not have the item before) on an external  drainage situation
- EXTERNAL_DRAINAGE_MAINTENANCE: Send a plumber to regular control (annual/periodic check) on an external drainage situation
- EXTERNAL_DRAINAGE_REPAIR: Send a plumber to repair a broken item (this might include parts installation or replacement) on an external drainage situation
- EXTERNAL_DRAINAGE_REPLACE: Send a plumber to replace a full / complete existing item with a new one on an external drainage situation
- EXTERNAL_DRAINAGE_TEMPORARY_SOLUTION: Send a plumber to temporary fix - performed to reduce the level of urgency/severity of a specific incident on an external drainage situation
- GLAZING_ASSESS: Send a glazier to evaluate the situation and produce a report giving additional information on the incident
- GLAZING_INSTALL: Send a glazier to install a complete new item (I did not have the item before)
- GLAZING_MAINTENANCE: Send a glazier to regular control (annual/periodic check)
- GLAZING_REPAIR: Send a glazier to repair a broken item (this might include parts installation or replacement)
- GLAZING_REPLACE: Send a glazier to replace a full / complete existing item with a new one
- GLAZING_TEMPORARY_SOLUTION: Send a glazier to temporary fix - performed to reduce the level of urgency/severity of a specific incident
- HEATING_ASSESS: Send a heating engineer to evaluate the situation and produce a report giving additional information on the  incident

post.summary: Allows the provider to communicate about the mission he is performing.

parameters.name: x-tenant-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA.

parameters.name: mission_id
parameters.description:
Identifier of the mission.
It is the same value than the identifier of the accepted mission order.

communication_code.description:
Code of the communication that the provider transmits during its mission.
The existing values are the following:
| CODE                        | MANDATORY FIELD              | DESCRIPTION                                                                                          |
| -------------------------   | ---------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION      | description                  | Indicates any other additionnal information.                                                         |
| ACTUAL_TIME_ARRIVAL         | actual_time_arrival          | Indicates the Actual Time Arrival (ATA) on the incident location.                                    |
| APPOINTMENT_REMINDER        | -*none*-                     | Indicates the provider want to remind the customer that the mission is planned for the specific date |
| CONTRACTOR_LEAVES           | -*none*-                     | Indicates that the provider leaves the incident location                                             |
| CURRENT_LOCATION            | current_location             | Indicates the current location of the provider.                                                      |
| DELAY_OF_ARRIVAL_TIME       | delay_of_arrival_time        | Indicates the estimated delay to arrive on the incident location.                                    |
| DIAGNOSTIC_CONFIRMED        | -*none*-                     | Indicates that the diagnostic is confirmed.                                                          |
| DISCLAIMER_SHEET_SIGNED     | -*none*-                     | Indicates that the customer has signed the disclaimer sheet.                                         |
| EN_ROUTE                    | -*none*-                     | Indicates that the provider is starting its way to the incident                                      |
| ESTIMATED_COMPLETION_TIME   | estimated_time_of_completion | Indicates the estimated time of work completion.                                                     |
| ESTIMATED_TIME_ARRIVAL      | estimated_time_arrival       | Indicates the Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) on the incident location.                              |
| JOURNEY_FINISHED_ABNORMALLY | -*none*-                     | Indicates the provider encountered an unexpected error conditions.                                   |
| ON_SCENE                    | -*none*-                     | Indicates that the provider is arrived on the incident location.                                     |
| WORK_COMPLETED              | work_completed_at            | Indicates the time at which the intervention is completed.                                           |
| WORK_STARTED                | work_started_at              | Indicates the time at which the intervention began.                                                  |

description.description:
Any complementary information about the mission
** Required if communication_code is empty or equal to _ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ **
description.example: there are traffic jams on the highway

arrival_information.description: Information about the provider arrival on site.

current_location.description:
Current location of the provider at the Date&Time the communication is transmit.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _CURRENT_LOCATION_ **

longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

estimated_time_arrival.description:
Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) communicated by the provider.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ESTIMATED_TIME_ARRIVAL_ **

actual_time_arrival.description:
Actual Time Arrival (ATA) on site of the provider. UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ACTUAL_TIME_ARRIVAL_ **

delay_of_arrival_time.description:
Provider estimation of the delay to arrive on site. ISO 8601 format (P18Y9M4DT11H9M8S).
** Required if communication_code is equal to _DELAY_OF_ARRIVAL_TIME_ **
For example "PT30M" means a period (P) of time (T) of 30 minutes (M).

work_started_at.description:
Date&Time the provider started its intervention on site
** Required if communication_code is equal to _WORK_STARTED_ **

estimated_time_of_completion.description:
Estimation of the provider about the mission completion.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ESTIMATED_COMPLETION_TIME_ **

work_completed_at.description:
Date&Time the provider completed its intervention on site
** Required if communication_code is equal to _WORK_COMPLETED_ **

has_extra_actions_required.description:
Indicates that the work is finished, but extra actions are required.
e.g. After the completion of a plumber task, the client might need to have a painter to clean-up the wall.

 - RADIATOR_LEAK: Radiator leak
 - RATS_INFESTATION: Rats infestation
 - RATS_NOISE: Rats noise
 - RATS_SIGHTING: Rats sighting
 - RED_SQUIRRELS_INFESTATION: Red squirrels infestation
 - RED_SQUIRRELS_NOISE: Red squirrels noise
 - RED_SQUIRRELS_SIGHTING: Red squirrels sighting
 - RODENTS_INFESTATION: Rodents infestation
 - RODENTS_NOISE: Rodents noise
 - STOLEN_KEYS: Stolen keys
 - STOLEN_KEYS_LOCKED_OUT: Stolen keys locked out
 - STORAGE_HEATER_BREAKDOWN: Storage heater breakdown
 - TELECOM_BREAKDOWN: Telecom breakdown
 - TOILET_WONT_FLUSH: Toilet wont flush
 - TOTAL_LOSS_OF_POWER: Total loss of power
 - TRAVEL_OR_MEDICAL: Travel or medical
 - UNDERFLOOR_HEATING_PROBLEM: Underfloor heating problem
 - VANDALISM: Vandalism
 - WASPS_HORNETS_INFESTATION: Wasps hornets infestation
 - WASPS_HORNETS_SIGHTING: Wasps hornets sighting

description.example: Water infiltration via seals around sanitary installations

incident_location.description: Starting location of the provider at the begining of the mission.

address.description: The address of the incident location.

subdivision.description: Area of the city, or department name.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

coordinates.description: The GPS coordinates of the incident location.

longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

intervention_object.description: All details concerning the object or the device concerned by the intervention.

name.description:
Name of the object requiring intervention. For example:
- boiler, if it is the device requiring intervention
- building roof, if the provider has to fix something on the roof

device_information.description: All information concerning the device used

fuel_type.description:
The fuel type of the device.
The possible values are:
- AIR_SOURCE: Air source, used for example by heat pump systems
- BIOMASS: Biomass
- ELECTRIC: Electricity
- GROUND_SOURCE: Ground source, used for example by geothermal systems
- LIQUID_PETROL_GAS: Liquid Petrol Gas hybrid
- NATURAL_GAS: Natural gas hybrid
- OIL: Oil
- SOLAR: Solar source
- SOLID_FUEL: Solid material like wood, coal, coke..
- UNKNOWN: Used when the information is not available

age.description:
Age of the device, in years, months, days.
ISO 8601 Duration format.
P5Y8M4D means a Period (P) of 5 Years (Y), 8 month (M) and 4 Days (D)

reference_number.description:
Reference of the device.
For example, "serial_number" for Gas appliance.

physical_caracteristic.description: All physical information and caracteristic concerning the intervention object

sizes.description: All size information of the intervention object (length, height, width)

unit.description:
Unit of measure of the device.

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
| Unit of measure | Description
| --------------- | -----------
| m               | meter
| [in_i]          | inches
| [ft_i]          | feet

Unit of measure of the device

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- w: Watt.

value.description: The value of the device power

unit.description:
Unit of measure of the intervention object surface

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- m2: Meter square,
- [sin_i]: square inch,
- [sft_i]: square feet.

value.description: The value of the intervention object surface

number_of_storeys.description: Number of storeys where the intervention object is located.

appointment_at.description:
The appointment date & time.
UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

person_on_site.description: Contact of the person on site.

title.description:
The title of the contact, its civility.
The possible values are:
- MR
- MS: Ms
- MISS: Miss
- DR: Doctor
- PR: Professor
- MRS: Mrs
- MASTER: Master
- LADY: Lady
- SIR: Sir
- LORD: Lord
- REVEREND: Reverend
- SISTER: Sister

first_name.description: The first name of the contact.

last_name.description: The last name of the contact.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact (prefix included).

parameters.name: consultation_id
parameters.description: ID of the medical consultation.

status.description:
Consultation status:
- PLANNED: Planned in the doctor calendar.
- STARTED: The consultation has started. Its in progress.
- COMPLETED: The doctor has completed the consultation (some administrative actions can be added).
- CLOSED: The consultation is closed, there is no pending tasks any more linked to it.
- CANCELLED: The consultation has been cancelled.

medical_documents.description:
List of the medical documents linked to the medical consultation.
All the documents are generated by the medical team.

code.description:
Type of the medical document.
  - ABSENCE_FROM_WORK_CERTIFICATE_FORM: Form of evidence used to confirm that an employee is unable to attend work either due to illness, injury.

  - PRESCRIPTION: Piece of paper on which your doctor writes an order for medicine and which you give to a chemist or pharmacist to get the medicine.

  - OTHER: Any other medical documents that are not mentionned above.

description.description:
Description of the document type.
Required if _code_ is equals to _OTHER_.

status.description:
Medical document status:
 - DOWNLOADED: The medical document is downloaded.
 - IDENTIFIED: The doctor identified a medical document as needed.
 - SENT: The medical document has been sent to the recipient.
 - WRITTEN: The medical document is written and available.

valid_until.description:
Date of end of validity of the medical document.
ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

recipient_type.description:
Type of recipient for the medical document:
 - Medical Laboratory
 - Pharmacy
 - Radiologist
 - ...

reason.description:
Reason of the refusal

The possible values are:

- CANT_ATTEMPT_WITHIN_SLA_TIME: Can't attempt with SLA time (Service Level Agreement)

- DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_EQUIPMENT: Provider does not have the right equipment

- DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_LICENCE: Provider does not have licence to perform this job

- DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_STAFF: Provider does not have right staff to perform the mission

- EQUIPMENT_NOT_AVAILABLE: Provider equipment currently not available

- LOCATION_OUT_OF_ZONE: Location out of zone

- OTHER: Any other reason. Use description to give the other reason

- PROVIDER_NOT_AVAILABLE: Provider currently not available

- SERVICE_NOT_COVERED: Service not covered by the provider

post.summary: Allows the provider to send a change request.

parameters.name: x-tenant-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA.

parameters.name: mission_id
parameters.description:
Identifier of the mission.
It is the same value than the identifier of the accepted mission order.

service.description: New service or equipment required to perform the mission.

service_code.description:
The code of the service.
The possible value are:
- TOWING: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place
- REPAIR_ON_SPOT: Repair the vehicle directly on the location of the incident
- LIFTING_CRANE: Lift the vehicle
- LONG_DISTANCE_TOWING : Tow the vehicle from one place to another place for more than 100 km
- DELIVERY: Deliver the vehicle (repaired, replacement or hired) to the customer location
- STORAGE: Put the vehicle in a secure location
- REPATRIATION: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place, but on very long distance

service_qualifiers.description:
List of service qualifiers that detail the service to provide.
The possible combinations are the following:

| Service_code           | Possible Service_qualifier                     |
| ---------------------- | -----------------------------------------------|
| TOWING                 | _no possible values_ |
| LONG_DISTANCE_TOWING   | _no possible values_ |
| REPAIR_ON_SPOT         | MOBILE_DRAIN, EV_CHARGING, JUMP_START, TIRE_REPLACEMENT, BATTERY_REPLACEMENT, OTHER_REGULAR_ROS|
| LIFTING_CRANE          | _no possible values_ |
| DELIVERY               | _no possible values_ |
| STORAGE                | _no possible values_ |
| REPATRIATION           | _no possible values_ |

Qualifiers description:
- MOBILE_DRAIN: Drain fuel within tank of car because of a misfuelling and fill the tank with the correct fuel.
- EV_CHARGING: Charge the electric vehicule on spot
- JUMP_START: Start a car with a flat battery with jump leads or by a sudden release of the clutch while the car is being pushed.
- TIRE_REPLACEMENT: Replacement of a tire of the vehicle.
- BATTERY_REPLACEMENT: Replacement of the battery of the vehicle.
- OTHER_REGULAR_ROS: Other breakdown that can be repaired on spot

equipments.description:
List of equipment items needed by the provider to perform its mission.
The possible values are:
- 4X4: 4x4,
- AIR_CUSHIONS: Air cushions
- COMMERCIAL_LOW_LOADER_HV: Commercial low loader,
- COVERED_TRANSPORTER: Covered transporter,
- EXTRACTOR_EQUIPMENT: Extrator equipment,
- SKATES_GOJACK: Dolly / gojack carts,
- SLA_TRANSPORTER: SLA transporter,
- STOLEN_WHEELS_KIT: Stolen wheels kit,
- TEMPORARY_SPARE_TIRES: Temporary spare tires,
- TYRE_VAN: Tyre van,
- UNIMOG_TRACTOR: Unimog tractor

subdivision.description: Area of the city, or department name.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

appointment_rescheduled_at.description: New appointment Date&Time. UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

total_cost_incl_tax.description: Request of a new total cost including tax. It does not imply to fulfill the "total_cost_excl_tax".

currency.description:
Currency of the amount.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

post.summary: Allows the provider to communicate about the mission he is performing.

parameters.name: x-tenant-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA.

parameters.name: mission_id
parameters.description:
Identifier of the mission.
It is the same value than the identifier of the accepted mission order.

communication_code.description:
Code of the communication that the provider transmits during its mission.
The existing values are the following:
| CODE                      | MANDATORY FIELD              | DESCRIPTION
| ------------------------- | -----------------------------| ---------------------------
| EN_ROUTE                  | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the provider is starting its way to the incident
| CURRENT_LOCATION          | current_location             | used to indicate the current location of the provider.
| ESTIMATED_TIME_ARRIVAL    | estimated_time_arrival       | used to indicate the Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) on the incident location.
| ON_SCENE                  | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the provider is arrived on the incident location.
| ACTUAL_TIME_ARRIVAL       | actual_time_arrival          | Used to indicate the Actual Time Arrival (ATA) on the incident location.
| DELAY_OF_ARRIVAL_TIME     | delay_of_arrival_time        | Used to indicate the estimated delay to arrive on the incident location.
| DIAGNOSTIC_CONFIRMED      | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the diagnostic is confirmed.
| WORK_STARTED              | work_started_at              | Used to indicate the time at which the intervention began.
| ESTIMATED_COMPLETION_TIME | estimated_time_of_completion | Used to indicate the estimated time of work completion.
| WORK_COMPLETED            | work_completed_at            | Used to indicate the time at which the intervention is completed.
| DISCLAIMER_SHEET_SIGNED   | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the customer has signed the disclaimer sheet.
| DESTINATION_ADDRESS       | address                      | Used to indicate the destination address.
| ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION    | description                  | Used to indicate any other additionnal information.

description.description:
Any complementary information about the mission
** Required if communication_code is empty or equal to _ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ **
description.example: there are traffic jams on the highway

service_destination.description:
Information on the service destination
description: ** Required if communication_code is equal to _DESTINATION_ADRESS_ **

subdivision.description: Area of the city, or department name.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

arrival_information.description: Information about the provider arrival on site.

current_location.description:
Current location of the provider at the Date&Time the communication is transmit.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _CURRENT_LOCATION_ **

longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

estimated_time_arrival.description:
Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) communicated by the provider.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ESTIMATED_TIME_ARRIVAL_ **

actual_time_arrival.description:
Actual Time Arrival (ATA) on site of the provider. UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ACTUAL_TIME_ARRIVAL_ **

delay_of_arrival_time.description:
Provider estimation of the delay to arrive on site. ISO 8601 format (P18Y9M4DT11H9M8S).
** Required if communication_code is equal to _DELAY_OF_ARRIVAL_TIME_ **
For example "PT30M" means a period (P) of time (T) of 30 minutes (M).

work_started_at.description:
Date&Time the provider started its intervention on site
** Required if communication_code is equal to _WORK_STARTED_ **

estimated_time_of_completion.description:
Estimation of the provider about the mission completion.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ESTIMATED_COMPLETION_TIME_ **

work_completed_at.description:
Date&Time the provider completed its intervention on site
** Required if communication_code is equal to _WORK_COMPLETED_ **

post.summary: Allows the provider to carry out his mission report.

parameters.name: x-tenant-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant, the value should be provided by AXA.

parameters.name: mission_id
parameters.description:
Identifier of the mission.
It is the same value than the identifier of the accepted mission order.

is_cancelled.description: Indicates that the mission has been cancelled.

actual_time_arrival.description: Actual Time Arrival (ATA) on site of the provider. UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

work_started_at.description: Date&Time the provider started its intervention on site.

work_completed_at.description: Date&Time the provider completed its intervention on site.

disclaimer_sheet_signed.description: Indicates that the disclaimer sheet has been signed.

total_distance.description:
Distance traveled by the provider to perform the mission.
By default, the field is not taken into account if one of the distance in _break_down_distances_ is filled.

unit.description:
Unit of the measure code.

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- km: kilometers.

break_down_distances.description: Distances traveled by the provider to perform the mission.

distance_from_base_to_incident.description: Distance traveled by the provider from its base (start location) to the incident location.

distance_from_incident_to_destination.description: Distance traveled by the provider from the incident location to the destination location.

distance_from_destination_to_base.description: Distance traveled by the provider from the destination location to its base.

unit.description:
Unit of the measure code.

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

Required if at least one of the distance properties is filled.

The possible values are:
- km: kilometers.

total_labour_hours.description:
Total number of labour hours required to repair the vehicle. ISO 8601 format (P18Y9M4DT11H9M8S).
For example "PT2H30M" means a period (P) of time (T) of 2 hours (H) and 30 minutes (M).

spare_parts.description: Spare parts used to make reparations.

type.description: Type of spare part.

unit_price_excl_tax.description: Unit price of the item, tax excluded

currency.description:
Currency of the amount.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

unit_price_incl_tax.description: Unit price of the item, tax included

currency.description:
Currency of the amount.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

Currency of the amount.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

did_a_second_towing.description: Indicated if the provider has done a second towing or not. For example if the provider did a towing to its garage, then another to the destination.

number_of_storage_days.description: Number of days for which the vehicle is parked by the provider, for example the time the destination garage is open.

storage_total_amount_excl_tax.description: Total amount excluding tax for the vehicle storage.

currency.description:
Currency of the amount.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

additional_information.description: Any complementary information about the mission.
additional_information.example: First destination closed. Changed for another garage 10km away.

case.description: Case description of the customer's situation.

service.description: Service and equipment asked in the change request:

service_code.description:
The code of the service.
The possible value are:
- TOWING: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place
- REPAIR_ON_SPOT: Repair the vehicle directly on the location of the incident
- LIFTING_CRANE: Lift the vehicle
- LONG_DISTANCE_TOWING : Tow the vehicle from one place to another place for more than 100 km
- DELIVERY: Deliver the vehicle (repaired, replacement or hired) to the customer location
- STORAGE: Put the vehicle in a secure location
- REPATRIATION: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place, but on very long distance

service_qualifiers.description:
List of service qualifiers that detail the service to provide.
The possible combinations are the following:

| Service_code           | Possible Service_qualifier                     |
| ---------------------- | -----------------------------------------------|
| TOWING                 | _no possible values_ |
| LONG_DISTANCE_TOWING   | _no possible values_ |
| REPAIR_ON_SPOT         | MOBILE_DRAIN, EV_CHARGING, JUMP_START, TIRE_REPLACEMENT, BATTERY_REPLACEMENT, OTHER_REGULAR_ROS|
| LIFTING_CRANE          | _no possible values_ |
| DELIVERY               | _no possible values_ |
| STORAGE                | _no possible values_ |
| REPATRIATION           | _no possible values_ |

Qualifiers description:
- MOBILE_DRAIN: Drain fuel within tank of car because of a misfuelling and fill the tank with the correct fuel.
- EV_CHARGING: Charge the electric vehicule on spot
- JUMP_START: Start a car with a flat battery with jump leads or by a sudden release of the clutch while the car is being pushed.
- TIRE_REPLACEMENT: Replacement of a tire of the vehicle.
- BATTERY_REPLACEMENT: Replacement of the battery of the vehicle.
- OTHER_REGULAR_ROS: Other breakdown that can be repaired on spot

equipments.description:
List of equipment items needed by the provider to perform its mission.
The possible values are:
- 4X4: 4x4,
- AIR_CUSHIONS: Air cushions
- COMMERCIAL_LOW_LOADER_HV: Commercial low loader,
- COVERED_TRANSPORTER: Covered transporter,
- EXTRACTOR_EQUIPMENT: Extrator equipment,
- SKATES_GOJACK: Dolly / gojack carts,
- SLA_TRANSPORTER: SLA transporter,
- STOLEN_WHEELS_KIT: Stolen wheels kit,
- TEMPORARY_SPARE_TIRES: Temporary spare tires,
- TYRE_VAN: Tyre van,
- UNIMOG_TRACTOR: Unimog tractor

incident_location.description: Starting location of the provider at the begining of the mission.

address.description: The address of the incident location.

subdivision.description: Area of the city, or department name.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

coordinates.description: The GPS coordinates of the incident location.

longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

is_underground.description: Define if the vehicle is underground or not.

subdivision.description: Area of the city, or department name.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

problem_description.description: The problem description is used to describe quickly the problem.
problem_description.example: The vehicle seems not have a engine failure. The engine stopped

problem_detail.description: The problem detail is required to detail deeply the problem.
problem_detail.example: Lot of smoke, starting few minutes before the car stopped

vehicle.description:
Characteristics of the vehicle.
In order to give information, at least one of the properties is mandatory.

age.description:
The age of the vehicle, in years, months, days. ISO 8601 format.
P01Y9M4DT11H9M8S => period of 1 year, 9 months, 4 days and 11 hours, 9 minutes, 8 seconds.

reference_number.description:
The reference number of the vehicle.
It is the "chassis_number".

vehicle_type.description:
Type of the vehicle.
The values are:
- AGRICULTURAL_TRUCK: Agricultural truck
- BIKE: Bike
- BUS_COACHES: Bus coaches, autocar
- CAR: car
- MOBILE_HOME_CAMPING_CAR: Mobile home, camper van
- MOTORCYCLE: Motorcycle
- TRUCK: Truck
- VAN: Van

first_registration_date.description:
The first registration date of the vehicle.
UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

registration_plate_number.description: The registration plate number of the vehicle.

cylinder_capacity.description: The cylinder capacity of the vehicle.

gear_box.description:
The gear box of the vehicle
The possible values are:
- AUTO: Automatic gearbox
- MANUAL: Manual gearbox
- SEMI_AUTO: Semi automatic gearbox
- SPEED_VARIATOR: Speed variator
- UNKNOWN: Unkown

fuel_type.description:
The fuel type of the vehicle.
The possible values are:
- ALCOHOL_ETHANOL: Alcohol ethanol
- BIO_DIESEL: Biologic Diesel
- DIESEL: Diesel
- ELECTRIC: Electricity
- ELECTRIC_DIESEL: Electricity and diesel hybrid
- ELECTRIC_GASOLINE: Electricity and gasoline hybrid
- GASOLINE: Gasoline
- HYDROGEN: Hydrogen
- LIQUID_PETROL_GAS: Liquid Petrol Gas hybrid
- NATURAL_GAS: Natural gas hybrid
- UNKNOWN: Unknown

transmission.description:
Define the vehicle transmission.
The possible values are:
- 4WD: Manual 4 WD,
- 2WD: Manual 2 WD,
- AWD: Automatic 4 WD,
WD = Wheels Drive.

has_trailer.description: Define the vehicle has trailer or not.

transported_good_type.description: The type of goods transported by the vehicle.

unit.description:
Unit of the measure code.

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- t: tonne.

sizes.description: All size information of the vehicle (length, height, width)

unit.description:
Unit of measure of the vehicle

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- m: meter.

proximity_floor.description:
The proximity floor, is used to define the proximity of the vehicle with the flor to provide the most suitable towing. It can be:
 - HIGH: when the car is not near to the floor (ex: 4*4, Land rover, ...)
 - LOW: When the car is very close to the floor (ex: Ferrari, Lamborghini)
 - REGULAR: Standard vehicle

unit.description:
Unit of the measure code.

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- \[mi_i]: miles,
- km: kilometers.

is_rolling.description: Define if the vehicle is rolling or not (a vehicle is rolling when all tires are still present and inflated).

appointment_at.description:
The appointment date & time.
UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

person_on_site.description: Contact of the person on site.

title.description:
The title of the contact, its civility.
The possible values are:
- MR
- MS: Ms
- MISS: Miss
- DR: Doctor
- PR: Professor
- MRS: Mrs
- MASTER: Master
- LADY: Lady
- SIR: Sir
- LORD: Lord
- REVEREND: Reverend
- SISTER: Sister

first_name.description: The first name of the contact.

last_name.description: The last name of the contact.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact (prefix included).

- CANT_ATTEMPT_WITHIN_SLA_TIME: Can't attempt with SLA time (Service Level Agreement)

- DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_LICENCE: Provider does not have licence to perform this job

- PROVIDER_NOT_AVAILABLE: Provider currently not available
- EQUIPMENT_NOT_AVAILABLE: Provider equipment currently not available
- LOCATION_OUT_OF_ZONE: Location out of zone
- OTHER: Any other reason. Use description to give the other reason

post.summary: Allows the provider to communicate about the mission he is performing.
post.description:
Allows the provider to communicate about the mission he is performing.

/!\ This endpoint will be removed on January 31 2022, new endpoint available on:
- POST /service/domestic/vexp/missions/{mission_id}/communications

parameters.name: mission_id
parameters.description:
Identifier of the mission.
It is the same than the mission_order_id you accepted [here](https://developers.axa-assistance.com/docs#/service/post_service_vexp_domestic_mission_orders__mission_order_id__accept).

communication_code.description:
Code of the communication that the provider transmits during its mission.
The existing values are the following:
| CODE                      | MANDATORY FIELD              | DESCRIPTION
| ------------------------- | -----------------------------| ---------------------------
| EN_ROUTE                  | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the provider is starting its way to the incident
| CURRENT_LOCATION          | current_location             | used to indicate the current location of the provider.
| ESTIMATED_TIME_ARRIVAL    | estimated_time_arrival       | used to indicate the Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) on the incident location.
| ON_SCENE                  | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the provider is arrived on the incident location.
| ACTUAL_TIME_ARRIVAL       | actual_time_arrival          | Used to indicate the Actual Time Arrival (ATA) on the incident location.
| DELAY_OF_ARRIVAL_TIME     | delay_of_arrival_time        | Used to indicate the estimated delay to arrive on the incident location.
| DIAGNOSTIC_CONFIRMED      | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the diagnostic is confirmed.
| WORK_STARTED              | work_started_at              | Used to indicate the time at which the intervention began.
| ESTIMATED_COMPLETION_TIME | estimated_time_of_completion | Used to indicate the estimated time of work completion.
| WORK_COMPLETED            | work_completed_at            | Used to indicate the time at which the intervention is completed.
| DISCLAIMER_SHEET_SIGNED   | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the customer has signed the disclaimer sheet.
| ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION    | description                  | Used to indicate any other additionnal information.

description.description:
Any complementary information about the mission
** Required if communication_code is empty or equal to _ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ **
description.example: there are traffic jams on the highway

arrival_information.description: Information about the provider arrival on site.

current_location.description:
Current location of the provider at the Date&Time the communication is transmit.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _CURRENT_LOCATION_ **

longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

estimated_time_arrival.description:
Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) communicated by the provider.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ESTIMATED_TIME_ARRIVAL_ **

actual_time_arrival.description:
Actual Time Arrival (ATA) on site of the provider. UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ACTUAL_TIME_ARRIVAL_ **

delay_of_arrival_time.description:
Provider estimation of the delay to arrive on site. ISO 8601 format (P18Y9M4DT11H9M8S).
** Required if communication_code is equal to _DELAY_OF_ARRIVAL_TIME_ **
For example "PT30M" means a period (P) of time (T) of 30 minutes (M).

work_started_at.description:
Date&Time the provider started its intervention on site
** Required if communication_code is equal to _WORK_STARTED_ **

estimated_time_of_completion.description:
Estimation of the provider about the mission completion.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ESTIMATED_COMPLETION_TIME_ **

work_completed_at.description:
Date&Time the provider completed its intervention on site
** Required if communication_code is equal to _WORK_COMPLETED_ **

description.example: Water infiltration via seals around sanitary installations

incident_location.description: Starting location of the provider at the begining of the mission.

address.description: The address of the incident location.

subdivision.description: Area of the city, or department name.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

coordinates.description: The GPS coordinates of the incident location.

longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

intervention_object.description: All details concerning the object or the device concerned by the intervention.

name.description:
Name of the object requiring intervention. For example:
- boiler, if it is the device requiring intervention
- building roof, if the provider has to fix something on the roof

device_information.description: All information concerning the device used

fuel_type.description:
The fuel type of the device.
The possible values are:
- AIR_SOURCE: Air source, used for example by heat pump systems
- BIOMASS: Biomass
- ELECTRIC: Electricity
- GROUND_SOURCE : Ground source, used for example by geothermal systems
- LIQUID_PETROL_GAS: Liquid Petrol Gas hybrid
- NATURAL_GAS: Natural gas hybrid
- OIL: Oil
- SOLAR: Solar source
- SOLID_FUEL: Solid material like wood, coal, coke..
- UNKNOWN: used when the information is not available

age.description:
Age of the device, in years, months, days.
ISO 8601 Duration format.
P5Y8M4D means a Period (P) of 5 Years (Y), 8 month (M) and 4 Days (D)

reference_number.description:
Reference of the device.
For example, "serial_number" for Gas appliance.

physical_caracteristic.description: All physical information and caracteristic concerning the intervention object

sizes.description: All size information of the intervention object (length, height, width)

unit.description:
Unit of measure of the device.

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
| Unit of measure | Description
| --------------- | -----------
| m               | meter
| [in_i]          | inches
| [ft_i]          | feet

Unit of measure of the device

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- w: Watt.

value.description: The value of the device power

unit.description:
Unit of measure of the intervention object surface

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- m2: Meter square,
- [sin_i]: square inch,
- [sft_i]: square feet.

value.description: The value of the intervention object surface

number_of_storeys.description: Number of storeys where the intervention object is located.

appointment_at.description:
The appointment date & time.
UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

person_on_site.description: Contact of the person on site.

title.description:
The title of the contact, its civility.
The possible values are:
- MR
- MS: Ms
- MISS: Miss
- DR: Doctor
- PR: Professor
- MRS: Mrs
- MASTER: Master
- LADY: Lady
- SIR: Sir
- LORD: Lord
- REVEREND: Reverend
- SISTER: Sister

first_name.description: The first name of the contact.

last_name.description: The last name of the contact.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact (prefix included).

example.error_description: The input information received were not compliant with the API specification.

401.description:
Unauthorized.
The identity of the caller hasn't been definitely confirmed (invalid issuer, expired token, ...)

example.error_description: Header "authorization" is not a valid JSON Web Token.

403.description:
Forbidden.
The identity of the caller is confirmed, however the required access grants aren't met (missing scope, unknwown client_id, ...)

example.error_description: The right to access this API has not been granted in the JSON Web Token.

404.description:
Not found.
The server did not find a current representation for the searched resource.

example.error_description: The searched resource was not found.

409.description:
Conflict.
The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

example.error_description: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

post.summary: Allows the provider to refuse the mission order.

parameters.name: x-environment
parameters.description:
When calling the API on a testing environment, the user has to precise in which environment the information should be sent:
- test -> Integration and User Acceptance Tests (UAT) environment

parameters.name: mission_order_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the mission order.

reason.description:
The car rental company cannot respond positively to the request and this is considered to be a refusal response, even if alternative proposals are given.
The possible values are:
- PICKUP_AGENCY_NOT_AVAILABLE : The pickup agency indicated in the reservation request is not available.
- RETURN_AGENCY_NOT_AVAILABLE : The return agency indicated in the reservation request is not available.
- EQUIPMENT_NOT_AVAILABLE : The equipment indicated in the reservation request is not available.
- VEHICLE_CATEGORY_NOT_AVAILABLE : The category of car type indicated in the reservation request is not available.
- CANT_ATTEMPT_WITHIN_SLA_TIME : Can't attempt within SLA time (Service Level Agreement).
- OTHER: Any other reason.

description.description:
Description of the refusal reason. It can contain the alternative proposals.
For example:
- the car requested is available in another pickup agency,
- and/or the pickup agency proposes a vehicle of another category.

Mandatory when _reason_ is equal to _OTHER_.
description.example: Erreur: HTZ -- 974 -- Catgorie indisponible -- Contreproposition catgorie alternative: CVMR; --  Exemple: 'NISSAN NOTE 1.5L DCI 4 PORTES CLIM

requestBody.description: Content of the Mission Order Refusal.

parameters.name: mission_order_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the mission order.

mission_report.description: Report done by the provider for the mission.

actual_time_arrival_on_site.description: Actual Time of Arrival on site - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

intervention_location_left_at.description: Date & Time when the provider left the intervention location - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

mission_begin_at.description: Date & Time when the mission started - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

mission_end_at.description: Date & Time when the mission finished - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

vehicle_delivered_at.description: Date & Time when the vehicle had been delivered - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

highway_entrance_at.description: Date of entrance on the highway - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

highway_exit_at.description: Date of exit of the highway - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

distance_to_garage.description: Distance from the intervention location to the destination Garage

distance_out_of_zone.description:
If the provider tarification depends on "zone", you can provide the distance traveled out of the zone
to access to the intervention location or to the destination garage

is_intervention_location_cleaning_needed.description: Indicates if the provider needed to clean the intervention location or not.

vehicle_characteristics.description: Characteristics of the vehicle concerned by the mission.

vehicle_status.description: Status of the vehicle concerned by the mission.

is_loaded.description: Indicates if the vehicule is loaded.

is_moving.description: Indicates if the vehicule is moving.

is_burnt.description: Indicates if the vehicule is burnt.

has_a_trailer_attached.description: Indicates if the vehicle has a trailer attached.

intervention_location.description: Information about the intervention location of the vehicle.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

place_type.description: Place type where the vehicle is parked.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

phones.description: List phone numbers of the destination garage.

international_prefix.description: Prefix of the phone number.

number.description: Phone number.

guarding.description: Information about the guarding if the provider has to keep the vehicle before delivery to the garage.

is_covered.description: Indicates if the provider guarding place is covered

additional_information.description:
Notes that can be added to comment the management of the mission.
_N.B. By submitting this list, the older one will be deleted and replaced with the one provided._

date.description: Date of the note - ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

distance_unit.description:
Unit of the measure for distances and mileages.

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- km: Kilometers;
- \[mi_i]: Miles.

weight_unit.description:
Unit of the measure code.

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- kg: kilogram;
- t: tonne.

parameters.name: mission_order_id
