reason.description:
Reason of the refusal
The possible values are:
- CANT_ATTEMPT_WITHIN_SLA_TIME: Can't attempt with SLA time (Service Level Agreement)
- DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_EQUIPMENT: Provider does not have the right equipment
- DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_LICENCE: Provider does not have licence to perform this job
- DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_STAFF: Provider does not have right staff to perform the mission
- PROVIDER_NOT_AVAILABLE: Provider currently not available
- EQUIPMENT_NOT_AVAILABLE: Provider equipment currently not available
- LOCATION_OUT_OF_ZONE: Location out of zone
- OTHER: Any other reason. Use description to give the other reason
- SERVICE_NOT_COVERED: Service not covered by the provider

description.description: A description of the refusal is required when reason is equal to _OTHER_.

parameters.name: x-environment
parameters.description:
When calling the API on a testing environment, the user has to precise in which environment the information should be sent:
- test -> Integration and User Acceptance Tests (UAT) environment

parameters.name: mission_id
parameters.description:
Identifier of the mission.
It is the same value than the identifier of the accepted mission order.

service.description: New service or equipment required to perform the mission.

service_code.description:
The code of the service.
The possible value are:
- TOWING: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place
- REPAIR_ON_SPOT: Repair the vehicle directly on the location of the incident
- LIFTING_CRANE: Lift the vehicle
- DELIVERY: Deliver the vehicle (repaired, replacement or hired) to the customer location
- STORAGE: Put the vehicle in a secure location
- REPATRIATION: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place, but on very long distance

service_qualifiers.description:
List of service qualifiers that detail the service to provide.
The possible combinations are the following:

| Service_code           | Possible Service_qualifier                     |
| ---------------------- | -----------------------------------------------|
| TOWING                 | _no possible values_ |
| REPAIR_ON_SPOT         | MOBILE_DRAIN, EV_CHARGING, JUMP_START, TIRE_REPLACEMENT, BATTERY_REPLACEMENT, OTHER_REGULAR_ROS|
| LIFTING_CRANE          | _no possible values_ |
| DELIVERY               | _no possible values_ |
| STORAGE                | _no possible values_ |
| REPATRIATION           | _no possible values_ |

Qualifiers description:
- MOBILE_DRAIN: Drain fuel within tank of car because of a misfuelling and fill the tank with the correct fuel.

- JUMP_START: Start a car with a flat battery with jump leads or by a sudden release of the clutch while the car is being pushed.
- TIRE_REPLACEMENT: Replacement of a tire of the vehicle.
- BATTERY_REPLACEMENT: Replacement of the battery of the vehicle.
- OTHER_REGULAR_ROS: Other breakdown that can be repaired on spot

post.summary: Allows the provider to communicate about the mission he is performing.
post.description:
Allows the provider to communicate about the mission he is performing.

/!\ This endpoint will be removed on January 31 2022, new endpoint available on:
- POST /service/roadside/vexp/missions/{mission_id}/communications

parameters.name: x-environment
parameters.description:
When calling the API on a testing environment, the user has to precise in which environment the information should be sent:
- test -> Integration and User Acceptance Tests (UAT) environment

parameters.name: mission_id
parameters.description:
Identifier of the mission.
It is the same than the mission_order_id you accepted [here](https://developers.axa-assistance.com/docs#/service/post_service_vexp_roadside_mission_orders__mission_order_id__accept).

communication_code.description:
Code of the communication that the provider transmits during its mission.
The existing values are the following:
| CODE                      | MANDATORY FIELD              | DESCRIPTION
| ------------------------- | -----------------------------| ---------------------------
| EN_ROUTE                  | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the provider is starting its way to the incident
| CURRENT_LOCATION          | current_location             | used to indicate the current location of the provider.
| ESTIMATED_TIME_ARRIVAL    | estimated_time_arrival       | used to indicate the Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) on the incident location.
| ON_SCENE                  | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the provider is arrived on the incident location.
| ACTUAL_TIME_ARRIVAL       | actual_time_arrival          | Used to indicate the Actual Time Arrival (ATA) on the incident location.
| DELAY_OF_ARRIVAL_TIME     | delay_of_arrival_time        | Used to indicate the estimated delay to arrive on the incident location.
| DIAGNOSTIC_CONFIRMED      | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the diagnostic is confirmed.
| WORK_STARTED              | work_started_at              | Used to indicate the time at which the intervention began.
| ESTIMATED_COMPLETION_TIME | estimated_time_of_completion | Used to indicate the estimated time of work completion.
| WORK_COMPLETED            | work_completed_at            | Used to indicate the time at which the intervention is completed.
| DISCLAIMER_SHEET_SIGNED   | -*none*-                     | Used to indicate that the customer has signed the disclaimer sheet.
| DESTINATION_ADDRESS       | address                      | Used to indicate the destination address.
| ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION    | description                  | Used to indicate any other additionnal information.

description.description:
Any complementary information about the mission
** Required if communication_code is empty or equal to _ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ **
description.example: there are traffic jams on the highway

service_destination.description:
Information on the service destination
description: ** Required if communication_code is equal to _DESTINATION_ADRESS_ **

subdivision.description: Area of the city, or department name.

country.description: Country ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

arrival_information.description: Information about the provider arrival on site.

current_location.description:
Current location of the provider at the Date&Time the communication is transmit.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _CURRENT_LOCATION_ **

longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 format, expressed in Decimal Degree (DD).

estimated_time_arrival.description:
Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) communicated by the provider.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ESTIMATED_TIME_ARRIVAL_ **

actual_time_arrival.description:
Actual Time Arrival (ATA) on site of the provider. UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ACTUAL_TIME_ARRIVAL_ **

delay_of_arrival_time.description:
Provider estimation of the delay to arrive on site. ISO 8601 format (P18Y9M4DT11H9M8S).
** Required if communication_code is equal to _DELAY_OF_ARRIVAL_TIME_ **
For example "PT30M" means a period (P) of time (T) of 30 minutes (M).

work_started_at.description:
Date&Time the provider started its intervention on site
** Required if communication_code is equal to _WORK_STARTED_ **

estimated_time_of_completion.description:
Estimation of the provider about the mission completion.
** Required if communication_code is equal to _ESTIMATED_COMPLETION_TIME_ **

work_completed_at.description:
Date&Time the provider completed its intervention on site
** Required if communication_code is equal to _WORK_COMPLETED_ **

When calling the API on a testing environment, the user has to precise in which environment the information should be sent:

service.description: Service and equipment asked in the change request:

service_code.description:
The code of the service.
The possible value are:
- TOWING: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place
- REPAIR_ON_SPOT: Repair the vehicle directly on the location of the incident
- LIFTING_CRANE: Lift the vehicle
- DELIVERY: Deliver the vehicle (repaired, replacement or hired) to the customer location
- STORAGE: Put the vehicle in a secure location
- REPATRIATION: Tow the vehicle from one place to another place, but on very long distance

The possible combinations are the following:

| REPAIR_ON_SPOT         | MOBILE_DRAIN, EV_CHARGING, JUMP_START, TIRE_REPLACEMENT, BATTERY_REPLACEMENT, OTHER_REGULAR_ROS|
| LIFTING_CRANE          | _no possible values_ |
| DELIVERY               | _no possible values_ |
| STORAGE                | _no possible values_ |
| REPATRIATION           | _no possible values_ |

- MOBILE_DRAIN: Drain fuel within tank of car because of a misfuelling and fill the tank with the correct fuel.
- EV_CHARGING: Charge the electric vehicule on spot
- JUMP_START: Start a car with a flat battery with jump leads or by a sudden release of the clutch while the car is being pushed.
- TIRE_REPLACEMENT: Replacement of a tire of the vehicle.
- BATTERY_REPLACEMENT: Replacement of the battery of the vehicle.
- OTHER_REGULAR_ROS: Other breakdown that can be repaired on spot

problem_description.description: The problem description is used to describe quickly the problem.
problem_description.example: The vehicle seems not have a engine failure. The engine stopped

problem_detail.description: The problem detail is required to detail deeply the problem.
problem_detail.example: Lot of smoke, starting few minutes before the car stopped

vehicle.description:
Characteristics of the vehicle.
In order to give information, at least one of the properties is mandatory.

age.description:
The age of the vehicle, in years, months, days. ISO 8601 format.
P01Y9M4DT11H9M8S => period of 1 year, 9 months, 4 days and 11 hours, 9 minutes, 8 seconds.

reference_number.description:
The reference number of the vehicle.
It is the "chassis_number".

vehicle_type.description:
Type of the vehicle.
The values are:
- AGRICULTURAL_TRUCK: Agricultural truck
- BIKE: Bike
- BUS_COACHES: Bus coaches, autocar
- CAR: car
- MOBILE_HOME_CAMPING_CAR: Mobile home, camper van
- MOTORCYCLE: Motorcycle
- TRUCK: Truck
- VAN: Van

first_registration_date.description:
The first registration date of the vehicle.
UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

registration_plate_number.description: The registration plate number of the vehicle.

cylinder_capacity.description: The cylinder capacity of the vehicle.

gear_box.description:
The gear box of the vehicle
The possible values are:
- AUTO: Automatic gearbox
- MANUAL: Manual gearbox
- SEMI_AUTO: Semi automatic gearbox
- SPEED_VARIATOR: Speed variator
- UNKNOWN: Unkown

fuel_type.description:
The fuel type of the vehicle.
The possible values are:
- ALCOHOL_ETHANOL: Alcohol ethanol
- BIO_DIESEL: Biologic Diesel
- DIESEL: Diesel
- ELECTRIC: Electricity
- ELECTRIC_DIESEL: Electricity and diesel hybrid
- ELECTRIC_GASOLINE: Electricity and gasoline hybrid
- GASOLINE: Gasoline
- HYDROGEN: Hydrogen
- LIQUID_PETROL_GAS: Liquid Petrol Gas hybrid
- NATURAL_GAS: Natural gas hybrid
- UNKNOWN: Unknown

transmission.description:
Define the vehicle transmission.
The possible values are:
- 4WD: Manual 4 WD,
- 2WD: Manual 2 WD,
- AWD: Automatic 4 WD,
WD = Wheels Drive.

has_trailer.description: Define the vehicle has trailer or not.

transported_good_type.description: The type of goods transported by the vehicle.

unit.description:
Unit of the measure code.

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- t: tonne.

sizes.description: All size information of the vehicle (length, height, width)

unit.description:
Unit of measure of the vehicle

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- m: meter.

proximity_floor.description:
The proximity floor, is used to define the proximity of the vehicle with the flor to provide the most suitable towing. It can be:
 - HIGH: when the car is not near to the floor (ex: 4*4, Land rover, ...)
 - LOW: When the car is very close to the floor (ex: Ferrari, Lamborghini)
 - REGULAR: Standard vehicle

unit.description:
Unit of the measure code.

Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) in case sensitive.

The possible values are:
- \[mi_i]: miles,
- km: kilometers.

is_rolling.description: Define if the vehicle is rolling or not (a vehicle is rolling when all tires are still present and inflated).

appointment_at.description:
The appointment date & time.
UTC date-time, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

person_on_site.description: Contact of the person on site.

title.description:
The title of the contact, its civility.
The possible values are:
- MR
- MS: Ms
- MISS: Miss
- DR: Doctor
- PR: Professor
- MRS: Mrs
- MASTER: Master
- LADY: Lady
- SIR: Sir
- LORD: Lord
- REVEREND: Reverend
- SISTER: Sister

first_name.description: The first name of the contact.

last_name.description: The last name of the contact.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact (prefix included).

post.summary: Gets quotes for roadside  services.

parameters.name: x-quote-mode
parameters.description: Quote mode, can be used to get a quote on draft or test mode.

service_criteria.description:
Service criteria.
** Required if quote_code is null **

distance.description: Distance between the incident location (vehicle location) and vehicle destination.

unit.description:
Unit of the measure.
ISO-20022 Unit Of Measure Code (available values [here](https://www.iso20022.org/standardsrepository/public/wqt/Description/mx/dico/codesets/_Y4XF0tp-Ed-ak6NoX_4Aeg_385163498)).

is_as_crow_flies.description: Indicates if the distance is as the crow flies.

postal_code.description: Postal code where the intervention will take place.

country.description: Country of intervention, ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format (2 letter codes).

to_schedule_on.description:
Prefered execution date and time of the service
UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ)

quote_code.description:
Existing Quote code.
If the Quote code is provided then the price will be updated based on this quote code.

price_before_discount_excl_tax.description: Price (Defined by front-end user (Agent, Partner...)) of the service excluding taxes, numeric with 2 decimals.

currency.description:
Currency of the amount.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

quote_code.description: Quote code.

quote_expire_at.description: Date and time of quotes expiration - UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

service.description: The service covered by the quote.

instruction.example: Explanation of what is done during the intervention.

advice.example: Tips while waiting for the intervention.

components.description: Set of component included in the service.

name.description: The name of the sub service.

description.example: Customer assistance for ordering a rental car.

tax_amount.description: Total amount of taxes applied to the service component, numeric with 2 decimals.

currency.description:
Currency of the amount.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

price_excl_tax.description: Price of the service component excluding taxes, numeric with 2 decimals.

currency.description:
Currency of the amount.
ISO 4217 format (3 letter code).

availability.description: Time slot where the service can be executed.

days_of_week.description: List of days on which the service is available.

public_holiday.description:
Public holiday on which the service is available.
ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

start_time.description:
The time when a service can be available per day.
UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

end_time.description:
The time when a service is no more available per day.
UTC datetime, RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).

minimum_hours_to_start.description: Earliest possible time when the service can be operate.

maximum_days_to_start.description: The Latest possible date limit for requesting the service.

attachments.description: List of document linked to the Quote.

items.description: Consent to be requested to the customer.

allOf.description: Disclaimer to display to the customer.

type.description: The type of desclaimer.

is_mandatory.description: Indicates if the consent is mandatory.

disclaimers.description: List of disclaimers to display to the customer.

items.description: Disclaimer to display to the customer.

type.description: The type of desclaimer.

total_taxes.description: Total amount of taxes, numeric with 2 decimals.

currency.description:

reason.description:
Reason of the refusal
The possible values are:
- CANT_ATTEMPT_WITHIN_SLA_TIME: Can't attempt within SLA time (Service Level Agreement) - DONT_HAVE_RIGHT_EQUIPMENT: Provider does not have the right equipment - LOCATION_OUT_OF_ZONE: Location out of zone - OTHER: Any other reason. Use description to give the other reason - PROVIDER_NOT_AVAILABLE: Provider currently not available
